title: How can I reduce mobile data usage
answer:
Connect to a Wi-Fi network if there is one available. 

Turn off the mobile data connection when you are not using mobile data. 

When browsing web pages, you can prevent images from loading on the page if you do not need to view them. 

In the Browser interface, open the options menu, select Settings > Bandwidth management and deselect Load images. 

Disable background data syncing if not needed. 

Swipe downwards from the status bar to display shortcut switches and then touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=123150) to turn off the auto sync function. 

Close the apps that you are not using. 

Open the list of recently-used apps and close the apps that you are no longer using. 

Stop apps in the background from accessing the Internet via mobile data. 

Go to Settings and select Networked apps. Then select the apps for which you want to restrict Internet access and turn off the corresponding mobile data switch.
